Queries.Template:
select DocumentId
    from ContentItemIndex 
    where ContentType = @contentType
Queries.Name: AllEntitiesSQL

Queries.Template:
select DocumentId
    from ContentItemIndex 
    where ContentType = 'EntityList' and DisplayText = @name
Queries.Name: EntityListSQL

Queries.Template:
select DocumentId
    from ContentItemIndex 
    where ContentType = @contentType
	limit @num
Queries.Name: AllEntitiesWithLimitSQL

Queries.Template:
select ContentType
	from TaxonomyIndex 
	where ContentField = @type and TermContentItemId = @id
Queries.Name: TaxonomyEntityCountSQL

Queries.Template: select DocumentId from ContentItemIndex where DisplayText = 'Topics' and latest = true;
Queries.Name: AllTaxonomiesSQL

Queries.Template:
(
  select TermContentItemId, count(TermContentItemId) as popularity 
  	from TaxonomyIndex 
  	where ContentField = 'Topics' 
  	group by TermContentItemId 
  	order by popularity desc 
  	limit 3
)
union all
(
  select TermContentItemId, count(TermContentItemId) as popularity 
  	from TaxonomyIndex 
  	where ContentField = 'Topics' 
  	group by TermContentItemId 
  	order by popularity asc
  	limit 3
)
Queries.Name: TaxonomyPopularitySQL
